mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS deviceId, a.device_imei AS deviceImei, a.bind_phone AS bindPhone, a.avaster, a.nickname AS nickName, a.add_time AS addTime, a.sex, a.weight, a.height, a.age, a.city, a.sos_list AS sosList FROM stk_device a WHERE a.device_imei = #{imei}
mapper.update: UPDATE stk_device a SET a.age = #{age}, a.avaster = #{avaster}, a.bind_phone = #{bindPhone}, a.city = #{city}, a.height = #{height}, a.nickname = #{nickName}, a.sex = #{sex}, a.weight = #{weight}, a.sos_list = #{sosList} WHERE 1=1 and id = #{deviceId}
